description: Multiple TP-LINK products allow a network-adjacent attacker with an administrative privilege to execute arbitrary OS commands by restoring a crafted backup file. The affected device, with the initial configuration, allows login only from the LAN port or Wi-Fi.

enisaIdProduct.product_version: firmware versions prior to "Archer AXE5400(JP)_V1_1.0.3 Build 20240319"
firmware versions prior to "Archer AX5400(JP)_V1_1.1.4 Build 20240429"
firmware versions prior to "Archer AX3000(JP)_V1_1.1.3 Build 20240415"
firmware versions prior to "Archer Air R5(JP)_V1_1.1.6 Build 20240508"
firmware versions prior to "Archer AXE75(JP)_V1_1.2.0 Build 20240320"
